revised_title: Observations on Rock-Plants and Their Growth
tldr: The author, John Beaumont, shares his observations on rock-plants and their growth in Mendip Hills, Somerset-shire. He describes various types of Trochitae and Entrochi, their shapes, sizes, and structures, as well as their hollows and rays. Beaumont also discusses the Radix, comparing it to a wheel and analyzing its structure and growth.
